text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Hitobito yo, watashi wa arrā no shito to shite, anata gata subete ni noko wa sa reta monodearu. Ten to ji no taiken wa, kare no monodearu. Kare no soto ni kami wa naku, kare wa nama o sazuke shi o ataeru okatadearu. Dakara arrā to o kotoba o shinpō suru, moji o shiranai shito o shinrai shikare ni shitagae. Sō sureba kitto anata gata wa michibika rerudearou
